text: Hiwa thengnga kheengkam sari kachoi marwaan tirton ngai karra marwaan tirton inkhat in keidiang heiwa ah analeiti, â€œHeiwaro, halli kei'n zool-inthai chuonna araming kasinu hi angtho tholi inrachaak sikme tihi naminmu kate, khawa inthang khuopui kha tuidung katamtak koolla insak eii. Jer 51:13
